results.title: Report a Missed Bin - Glasgow City Council
results.snippet: You can report a missed bin using our online form. Once you submit a report, please ensure you make your bin available for collection.

results.snippet: To help us process your missed bin collection report efficiently, please indicate which bin was not collected.

selected_links.title: Report a Missed Bin - Glasgow City Council
strengths: Offers an online form for reporting missed bin collections
Provides clear instructions on making the bin available for collection
selected_links.reasoning: The title directly matches the requirement to find council customer information about missing bins, the provided snippet supports this, and there seems to be an easy-to-use online form.

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reasons.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reasons.answer_quality: The content answers this need partially as it provides a link to the online form for reporting a missed bin collection, but does not explicitly state how to proceed if the bin was supposed to be collected on a specific day.
Reasons.reasoning: Though the page informs about the new online missed bin collections form, it lacks specific details or guidance for residents who have forgotten to put their bins out on a scheduled collection day.
Reasons.next_actions: I would visit the provided link and use the online form to report the missed collection. I will also try contacting the council directly if more information is required about my specific waste collection schedule.

analysis.overall_assessment: The content serves my needs partially as it directs me towards an online resource for reporting a missed bin collection, but does not provide clear guidance for those who have forgotten to put their bins out on a scheduled day. It could greatly improve with more detailed instructions and contingency plans for such situations.
